content: #FHIR-25564 raises a new question for us - who owns the conversion maps?
I think I see what you're getting at - should the committees that own the resources also own the conversion maps. Perhaps with technical assistance...
Aka "Grahame writes them all"? If the work groups were meaningfully involved in the creation and could evaluate feedback, then maybe. But I don't believe that's the case.
Well, a few people helped me. So on the one hand, the committees are not familiar with the language but they own the content problem the language is describing
Item for discussion at the next meeting: (@Anne Wizauer): we need to clearly document our position with regard to use of SNOMED CT in HL7 published IGs.
nearest is https://wiki.hl7.org/FHIR_Vocabulary_binding_for_Authors - needs migrating to confluence and a working over
